definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: scorch, blight (Nh id.; Niph. Hithp. be blighted; J Aram. [[שְׁדַף]] Ithpe. burn (up); Ar.sdf IV. be dark);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pt. pass. cstr., of ears of grain, [[שְׁדוּפׂת קָדִים]] Ge 41:6 scorched by a sirocco, so ´[[שְׁדֻפוֹת ק]]: v:Ge 41:23, ´[[הַקּ]] :´[[שׁ]]: v:Ge 41:27 (all E).
